title: Woodside Energy Chief O’Neil To Take Helm at BP in 2026
summary: FTSE 100 oil major BP has replaced its top boss after just two years in the role as the energy giant targets a major turnaround. title: US Oil Drillers Slow Activity In Tough Price Environment
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell by 6 this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday, bringing the total rig count in the US to 542 this week, down 47 from this same time last year. title: Trump's 'Gold Card' relies on legal loophole to help wealthy foreigners get U.S. visa
summary: In exchange for $1 million and a $15,000 processing fee, "Gold Card" applicants will get full-time residency in the U.S., the program's website says.
